meanings.definition: A writing desk or table with drawers
meanings.sent1: She kept her pens and papers neatly organized in the small escritoire.
meanings.sent2: The antique escritoire in the study had intricate carvings on its drawers.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the escritoire was a perfect spot to hide its toys.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an escritoire of memories, each drawer holding a different moment.
meanings.sent5: The escritoire stood proudly in the corner, a silent witness to history.

meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with a flat top and drawers, used as a writing surface
meanings.sent1: He sat at the escritoire, pen in hand, ready to write a letter.
meanings.sent2: The modern escritoire in the office had a sleek design and ample storage.
meanings.sent3: The escritoire seemed to whisper stories of the letters written on its surface.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed onto the paper like a river from the escritoire.
meanings.sent5: The old escritoire bore the marks of time, each scratch a tale of its own.
